ai-patthana8.55:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.55:1.1_0: Not being excited by defilements or corruptions. Their teaching doesn’t give rise to the defilements. When corrupted by defilements are not corrupted, nor is conditioned by defilements. ...
ai-patthana8.55:2.1_0: They don’t give rise to the defilements or corruptions without defilements. They don’t give rise to the defilements. Their causes and get tied to corruption. They don’t give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.55:3.1_0: One should not give rise to the defilements, or the corruptions without defilements. They don’t give rise to the defilements. They don’t give rise to the defilements of defilements. Their causes unskillful qualities to be corrupted by them. Their causes of defilements don’t give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.55:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
